title: Heaven Mart
description: Crafted a responsive online clothing store website using HTML, SCSS, and React, showcasing an eye-catching design. Focused on user-centric design principles to enhance the overall shopping experience.

title: Fashion Elegance
description: Designed and developed a responsive online clothing store website using HTML, SCSS, and React, to showcase skills. Employed Firebase for efficient database management, ensuring seamless data handling.

title: MaxFlix (in progress)
description: Maxfix app project aims to replicate the core functionalities and user experience of the popular streaming platform Netflix using React.js.

title: Taste Hub
description: This is a front end website template idea for a food shop
